Who we are
We have gone above and beyond to be the ultimate POWERHOUSE HEX CORE HOST. We don't' use yesterdays technology. We use tomorrows! Dual HEX E5 Powerhouse servers on a RAID10 system for maximum performance and protection are a way of life here. We don't simply advertise RAID10, we live by the protection it provides against hardware failure, and the blazing fast performance it delivers.

We do not simply advertise that you receive 100% of the resources your plan comes with, we guarantee it. We do not simply offer VPS hosting on dated hardware, we provide next generation, high end Dual Hex E5 Powerhouse machines with fast SATAIII or SSD drives, RAID10 Storage for Protection and Performance, and systems built solid from the ground up.

Give us a call. Try us out. Let us earn your business. We're going to show you what it's like to have a good, long lasting business relationship with a team that cares and means what they say. This is who we are. This is why we continue to grow exponentially. This is what makes us Webhostpython.com


All VPS Plans come on our Dual Hex Xeon E5 Series Powerhouse Servers with RAID 10 Storage for Maximum Performance and Data Protection. They also come with:

- 24/7 Customer Support
- Fully Managed (or unmanaged if you choose so)
- Direct Phone Support
- KVM 100% Virtualization
- Full root access
- Remote Reboot
- VNC
+ Full Freedom, Control, and Power over your VPS
-- Perform Unlimited OS Reloads yourself
-- Connect Via VNC
-- Change OS at your desire
-- Load Desktop GUI if preferred
-- Take ownership of your VPS
